title: Request for Body Cam Footage of Arrest on September 26, 2024

communications.subject: Pennsylvania Right to Know Act Request: Request for Body Cam Footage of Arrest on September 26, 2024
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Pennsylvania Right to Know Act, I hereby request the following records:

Incident Details for Footage Retrieval:

Date: September 26, 2024
Location: Dick’s Sporting Goods, 1587 Fruitville Pike, Lancaster, PA 17601
Suspect: Melissa Jean Musti, 42
Incident Summary: Officers responded to a shoplifting incident at Dick’s Sporting Goods. While taking the suspect into custody, Musti struck a victim in the back of the head and bit another on the forearm. She repeatedly yelled profanities, causing public alarm, and resisted arrest by pulling away and flailing her arms. Musti was charged with aggravated assault, obstruction of justice, resisting arrest, and disorderly conduct and was committed to Lancaster County Prison.
I am requesting copies of all body-worn camera footage from officers who:

Responded to the shoplifting incident.
Interacted with Melissa Jean Musti.
Took Musti into custody.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Harun

Sincerely,

mohamed abouelnaga

title: Request for Body Cam Footage of Arrest on September 2, 2019

communications.subject: New Jersey Open Public Records Act Request: Request for Body Cam Footage of Arrest on September 2, 2019
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the New Jersey Open Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

Incident Details for Footage Retrieval:

Date: September 2, 2019
Location: Decatur Street and Lyle Lane, Cape May, NJ 08204
Suspect: Francis J. Smith, 43
Incident Summary: Smith was arrested for shoplifting and subsequently charged with aggravated assault on law enforcement, resisting arrest, disorderly conduct, and obstructing the administration of law.
I am requesting copies of all body-worn camera footage from officers who:

Responded to the incident.
Interacted with Francis J. Smith during the investigation.
Took Smith into custody.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 7 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Harun
